ReverseFibonacciRiskManagement.Description: Configurable Reverse Fibonacci Defense System settings

Notes.ResetProfitThreshold: Daily profit amount required to reset consecutive loss counter back to base limit. Set to $16 for more frequent resets and faster recovery.
Notes.DailyLimits: Risk limits for consecutive loss days: [Day 0, Day 1, Day 2, Day 3+]
Notes.Usage: Lower threshold allows quicker recovery from losing streaks while maintaining capital preservation
